title: Aaron Donald gets paid, NFL nicknames, AFC Pressure, Scott Pioli, Deebo News, and Head Coach Rankings
itunes:title: Aaron Donald gets paid, NFL nicknames, AFC Pressure, Scott Pioli, Deebo News, and Head Coach Rankings
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Aaron Donald's reworked deal with the Rams.  Hosts Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, Will Selva, and Fmr NFL RB Maurice Jones-Drew discuss if this deal serves the player and team equally.   After giving their best NFL nicknames ever, the crew debates which QB is under the most pressure in the AFC.  Fmr NFL GM Scott Pioli drops by before we discuss what Deebo Samuels attending minicamps means for the 49ers.  We wrap up with our thoughts on a list of the NFL Head Coaching rankings and Kyle explains why he doesn't like the list.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
